name: Camper Diem
description:
Couple of friends, nothing to lose, just the wilderness and a couple of brewskis, those were the best years of my life... But no more, I got the band back together and we'll finally relive those golden moments once again if my name isn't the Cardinal!

There is a big bug right now, one cannot choose truth in the truth or dare questions... But we'll be fixing that soon!
